snippet: Nicholas Zagoreos needed a house with three bedrooms and a yard for his dogs. He went looking in Darien, Conn.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Nicholas Zagoreos for a three-bedroom home with a yard in New Canaan, Conn; found three-bedroom colonial in nearby Darien for $574,000.
lead_paragraph: Nicholas Zagoreos needed a house with three bedrooms and a yard for his dogs. He went looking in Darien, Conn.

headline.print_headline: A Change of Scene, One Town Over
headline.seo: The Hunt - A Change of Scene, One Town Over
headline.main: A Change of Scene, One Town Over
